attributes.action: give financial reward to those who wear brightly coloured clothes (not just at festivals) in order to make the world a happier place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bright colours make you feel happy, they cheer up the environment and make people who look at those wearing them smile and often laugh !!.

Life is too short to be serious, so by encouraging more happiness through colour in everyday life, everyone will surely benefit - go on give it a signature what have you got to lose, (apart from your sense of style) !!!.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
